name: Amazon
values: Customer Obsession,Ownership,Invent and Simplify,Are Right, A Lot,Learn and Communicate Vision,Earn Trust,Deliver Results with Scale,Hire and Develop the Best,Insist on the Highest Standard
themes: To be Earth's most customer-centric company where customers can find and discover anything they might want to buy online,Focus areas include innovation, technology leadership, sustainability, and global expansion
decisionMaking: Decisions are data-driven and iterative, with a strong emphasis on experimentation and learning from failures,Leadership encourages transparency and open communication, ensuring that all employees feel empowered to contribute ideas and feedback
culture: A fast-paced, innovative environment that values collaboration, diversity, and continuous improvement,Promotes an entrepreneurial spirit where every employee is encouraged to innovate and drive change
